provisions.title: Section 6
provisions.content:
6.-(1) The Commission shall meet at least once evely three months at Procedure
such places and times as the Commission may determine.                  and ~neerings.
        (2) The Chairman may at any time call a special meeting of the
Commission and shall call a special meeting within seven days of the receipt
of a written request for that purpose, addressed to him by any ten members
or one-third ofthe members of the Commission, whichever is greater.
        (3) In the absence of the Chairman, the Deputy Chairman shall
preside at all meetings.
     (4) The quorum of the Commission shall be forty per cent of the
members.
        (5) The decisions of the Commission shall be by a majority of votes
and in addition to an original vote the Chairman or other member presiding
at the meeting shall have a casting vote in any case in which the voting
is equal.
        (6) Subject to the provisions of this Schedule, the Co~nmissionmay
regulate its own proceedings.
        (7) The validity of any proceedings of the Commission shall not be
affected by any vacancy among the members thereof or by any defect in the
appointment of a member thereof.
       (8) Minutes in proper form of each meeting of the Commission shall
be kept and shall be confirmed as soon as practicable at a subsequent
meeting.

Minister.
        (5) For the purposes of this section, the prescribed rate
means one million dollars per annum or such higher rate as the
Minister may, from time to time, by order, prescribe.
